news.title: SAVE THE DATE: REDSTREAMS Q&A WITH ALIX WILTON REGAN, JANE PERRY AND MINJI CHANG!
news.description: What could be better than having Minji Chang, Alix Wilton Regan or Jane Perry on REDstreams? Having all three of them at once, of course! Tune in to REDstreams Q&A episode, this Wednesday, February 21st, at 6PM CET on https://www.twitch.tv/cdprojektred. Hosted as always by our Senior Community Managers: Amelia Kołat and Alicja Kozera!

news.title: SAVE THE DATE: REDSTREAMS WITH ALIX WILTON REGAN & JANE PERRY!
news.description: Curious about the behind-the-scenes magic of capturing the voices of Night City's formidable women? Look no further! Prepare yourselves for an upcoming special episode of REDstreams, featuring none other than Alix Wilton Regan, the voice behind Alt Cunningham, and Jane Perry, the iconic Rogue!

news.title: PATCH 2.11
news.description: Patch 2.11 for Cyberpunk 2077 and Phantom Liberty is being rolled out on PC, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. In this update we focused on fixing the most common issues encountered by players, including Finisher animations, and added a little something for Rayfield enthusiasts!

news.title: SAVE THE DATE: REDSTREAMS WITH MINJI CHANG & BORYS PUGACZ-MURASZKIEWICZ!
news.description: After the last REDstreams with Mr Hands you asked for more, so we used our connections in Night City to interview other characters. Tune in next week for a stream featuring Minji Chang, who voiced Songbird in #Cyberpunk2077 #PhantomLiberty. She'll be accompanied by Borys Pugacz-Muraszkiewicz, our English Adaptation Director.

products.title: Cyberpunk City Poster
products.description: Transform your interior with this stunning Cyberpunk City poster. It brings the cyberpunk atmosphere to your room with vivid colors and details, creating a unique ambiance.

products.title: Cyberpunk Logo Hoodie
products.description: Look stylish and modern with this fashionable Cyberpunk logo hoodie. It fits comfortably and is suitable for both everyday wear and gaming sessions.

products.title: Cyberpunk City Poster
products.description: This amazing Cyberpunk City poster will bring the future's atmosphere to your home. It's an excellent choice for science fiction and cyberpunk enthusiasts.

products.title: Cyberpunk RGB Mousepad
products.description: This RGB mousepad adds a stylish touch to your gaming setup. With RGB lighting and a comfortable surface, it's perfect for gamers.

products.title: Cyberpunk Logo Cap
products.description: Add some brightness to your outfit with this Cyberpunk 2077 logo cap. With high-quality materials and a stylish design, it's a great addition to your wardrobe.

products.title: Cyberpunk RGB Mousepad
products.description: Embrace the cyberpunk aesthetic with this RGB mousepad. It creates an impressive gaming atmosphere with its lighting and stylish design.

characters.name: Myers
characters.description: The former and the current President of the New United States of America. Currently in her third term, Myers is in the unenviable position of running a country at a time when power is wielded by corporations. While traveling on the Space Force One, Myers, triggering a power struggle with far-reaching consequences.

characters.name: Songbird
characters.description: A talented netrunner and right hand. There aren’t many people who can keep up with her abilities. Songbird’s talent makes her a valuable asset to the NUSA, one the country needs on its side to defend the nation’s precarious position. Leaving her post is not an option.

characters.name: Reed
characters.description: Solomon Reed is an experienced FIA agent who’s proven himself countless times in covert intelligence missions. He knows better than anyone how to tap into the , how to extract information, and how to break into even the most tightly guarded places. His loyalty and sense of duty is difficult to shake.

characters.name: Alex
characters.description: Once an aspiring braindance actress, Alex was recruited to the NUSA’s Federal Intelligence Agency by Solomon Reed. A talented shapeshifter, she also happens to have a mean streak that  did nothing to temper. But as long as she’s playing a part, her true personality won’t peek through.

characters.name: Hansen
characters.description: Colonel Hansen rules Dogtown with an iron fist. He carved out this patch of land for himself during the  and intends to keep it with the help of his loyal Barghest soldiers. Hansen’s military background doesn’t mean he favors violence as a solution; his keen intellect and strategic foresight make him a formidable foe.
